Detailed Description

The FontPackConnector provides functionality for accessing the data of a font pack.

Member Function Documentation

static BOOLEAN FontPackConnector::ContainsFont (  FontId  id  )  [static]
 

Returns true if the font pack contains a font with the id provided in parameter id.

Returns:
TRUE if font with the given id is available.

Returns the index of the active font.

INT  size
)  [static]
